acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These were purchased from Jerry N. Showalter, Bookseller, Ivy, Virginia, by the University of Virginia Library on May 31, 1995.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of five pocket ledger books, 1822-1858, and 1883-1884; four from the estate of John M. Preston of Seven Mile Ford, and one from Levi Bowers.

did.unittitle:
Pocket Ledger, with a list of names on pages 35-36, with 38 pages total
1825-1831

Pocket expense ledger, including records for a trip to Huntsville [Alabama]
1822-1843

Pocket Ledger, with a list of Seven Mile Ford lands
1846-1856

"Shoe Book," ledger recording the shoes issued to slaves belonging to Preston (mostly blank)
1847-1856

Continuation of the "Shoe Book," ledger recording the shoes issued to slaves belonging to Preston, but also including notes re the weather in 1858, cattle grazing in 1857-1858, and two pages concerning the account of Nick Barger, 1883-1884 (mostly blank) 1857-1858, 1883-1884
